code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useContext}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{AuthContext}from"../context/AuthContext";import SearchBar from"../components/SearchBar";import LanguageSwitcher from"../components/LanguageSwitcher";import{getNearestOffices}from"../services/officeService";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const{user}=useContext(AuthContext);const{t}=useTranslation();const[offices,setOffices]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{if(!user||!user.jwtToken){console.error("User not authenticated");return;}navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(async position=>{try{const{latitude,longitude}=position.coords;console.log("Fetching offices for:",latitude,longitude);const data=await getNearestOffices(latitude,longitude,user.jwtToken);setOffices(data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching offices:",error);}},error=>console.error("Geolocation error:",error.message));},[user]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold",children:t("Welcome")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LanguageSwitcher,{})]}),user&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mt-2",children:[t("Hello"),", ",user.name,"!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:t("Nearby Offices")}),offices.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:t("No offices found nearby.")}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:offices.map(office=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[office.name," - ",office.city]},office.id))})]})]});};export default Home;
